data.persona: I was trained by the prince's best archer. I drilled for 8 hours each day. I won the tournament four years in a row. I hope to leave the prince's service much richer than I was when I came in.
data.description:
You are in the Horse's stables.
The stables smell terrible, and are riddled with brown feces on the ground. The horses are tame and magnificent brown. The open plains are yellow and green with grass.
There's a hay, a horse, a feces, a tack room, and a Open plain here.
The knights in training is here.

You are carrying a hankercheif from a lady, wearing a glove, and wielding a bow.
data.goal: give bow to knights in training

data.short_motivation: I want become the prince's archery trainer.
data.mid_motivation: I want to become the best instructor in the history of the king's archery program.
data.long_motivation: I want to be legendary when discussed by other kingdoms. I want the entire realm to fear my soldiers.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the stables and await the knights.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the bow from the tack room.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the bow to take practice shots as the knights arrive.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the knights along the archery course and monitor their progress.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat a celebratory meal with the best of the knights, while those who fell short of my standards are made to continue practicing.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: wield the bow to offer techniques to the knights to finish the day's lesson.
